meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joey Falco Tamara Tatum-Broughton Elisabeth Carrel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6347.

td.p: Joey Falco, a writer from Santa Monica, California
Tamara Tatum-Broughton, an assistant professor of biology from Washington, D.C.
Elisabeth Carrel, a copy editor from Elgin, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,000)

tr.td: HIGHWAYS & BYWAYS
AP MALE ATHLETE OF THE YEAR
STUPID ANSWERS
PLANT-HERS
GOOD NEWS
A "LEG" TO STAND ON

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Washington, D.C. has no streets named for "Y", "Z" or this letter of the alphabet because of its similarity to "I"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Washington, D.C. has no streets named for "Y", "Z" or this letter of the alphabet because of its similarity to "I"
